name: Kart Racing 3D Best Desert Drag Sprint Race Gear
name_original: Kart Racing 3D Best Desert Drag Sprint Race Gear
description:
Kart Racing 3D is the best 3d arcade racer game features nice dessert sand road,pyramid tunnel with day or night mode and six different camera views. Race along with other artificial intelligence (AI) cars for the desired number of laps assisted with back camera view mirror and win!

Key features;
Challenge AI opponents
Choose between 2 different unique car models and 6 different colors for each.
Switch between day & night mode during game play
Beautiful 3D graphics of pyramid & sand mountain and old buildings & lake
Custom choice of Steering, Stick, or Motion control for wheel and throttle
Picture-in-Picture(PIP) 2D overview track map
Continuous feed - car back camera view mirror
Choose from 3 fun game modes Race & Chase, Countdown & Timer
Multiple camera views including front facing car view (Inside/Outside & Sky views)
Collision fire sparks
Unique and absorbing music tracks plus SFX/sound controls
